name: 3D Platformer (Emin28)
description:
This is my 3D Platformet project I made while completing Game Design and Development 4.

You can use W, A, S, D to move and Space button to jump and double jump.

Modifications:

1) Changed 3 different levels.

2) Changed level 1 so it becomes more challenging and interesting to explore.

3) New challenges.
